onyomiExamples.meaning: relocation of the capital, transfer of the capital
installation of a deity in a new shrine, transfer of a shrine
demotion, relegation, reduction in rank, degradation, downward move

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to move (house), to transfer (department), to change the target of interest or concern, to elapse (passage of time), to be permeated by a colour or scent, to be infected, to be contagious, to spread (as in fire)

to transfer (to a different place, group, etc.), to change, to swap, to substitute, to move to the next stage (of a plan, etc.), to divert (one's attention) to, to spend (time), to let (time) pass, to infect, to permeate something (with a color, smell, etc.)
